entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:14 PM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 3:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 33 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains early in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains early in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023
